text: The benefits are approximately 44 % from the baseline , or 940 000 DALYs in EU - 26 , and changing from reduction of 41 % ( 865 000 DALY ) with lower source control assumptions to 57 % ( 1 . 21 million DALY ) with higher source control assumptions , demonstrating source control to be more effective than dilution or filtration even with smaller reductions of source exposures .
